Additionally, the damage to the equipment was due to the domme's actions, not the author's. The domme's threat to report him for non-payment seems unfair given the circumstances. 

So, the author isn't in the wrong because the domme violated the agreed-upon safe word and caused harm. The author's priority was his safety and health, which is the main concern in any consensual activity.
